overview: After a hot and heavy evening Elon enters a car wash and transforms back into a well-dressed married businessman.The ease with which Elon changes makes it clear that this is a regular activity. Minutes into Elon's drive home he receives a series of threatening messages from an unknown number. He keeps calm until receiving a compromising photo of himself from the night before. Elon is being blackmailed. The unknown number sends him on a bizarre scavenger hunt through the desert until he is finally instructed to destroy his car. Not sure if he can go through with it, Elon’s secret becomes clear and the unknown blackmailer’s identity is revealed. It’s Elon's worst possible nightmare.
title: Ruby
